Text: Big thank you for this, I wanted to see this original mini-series first, it's a good introduction. The new series starts today on the BBC.

Nice! Thanks a million! And thanks for not RAR-splitting the u/l.

However, it would have been even nicer if you had supplied the subtitles separately rather than hardcoded, and if you had split the DVD into the five different episodes, rather than cutting them up in four equal parts -- the third part contains just a minute or so of the fifth episope, for instance.
